name: Pro League Llama V'Ball Championship
description:
Pro League Llama V'Ball Championship is a 2 player old school volleyball game. Two llamas, Alpacandy and Llamazure, compete to win this incredibly rough battle.

Made for Love Jam 2020.

By: Estelle Martinez (art) and David Corticchiato (dev)

Engine: LÖVE

Sprite editor: ASEPRITE

Libs: classic.lua

Music: 06-06-19 synthwave by Spring
Sounds: Applause by Blender Foundation
